segments.text: The kitchen layout is straightforward, with cabinets and counter space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman is positioned at the sink area, handling dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running, causing overflow to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is solely on the plate in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy uses a stool to access the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's retrieving items from the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears unstable under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands nearby, observing and participating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She extends her arm toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a well-kept garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back to allow light in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a typical domestic setting with some activity.
segments.speaker: PAR
